body:
Some people may have heard about this, but for those of you that don't know, the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge is when you get nominated to dump a bucket of ice water on your head and then nominate three other people, or you can donate $100 to the ALS foundation, if you're a wimp. I was recently nominated (on Facebook), and when I did it I thought it would be cool to bring this to Avicus. 



See I did it!!!!! And now I would like to nominate AdrianG503, IvyCode and Jake41901. Y'all have 24 hours. I would recommend that you Skype the people you nominate, as to make sure they see it! Have fun guys!

title: ALS Ice Bucket Challenge
